pullrequest.title: Add extra gazebo libraries to config.cmake and pkg_config

content.raw: It might be ok, but it is a change in behavior, and I was making a conservative suggestion to avoid unintended consequences. `gazebo_test_fixture` is only meant for integration tests, and shouldn't be necessary for other use cases like linking a `ModelPlugin`. If it doesn't break anything, I suppose it's fine, but after all the windows pull requests, I assume that any change will break something on Windows.
content.html: It might be ok, but it is a change in behavior, and I was making a conservative suggestion to avoid unintended consequences. gazebo_test_fixture is only meant for integration tests, and shouldn't be necessary for other use cases like linking a ModelPlugin. If it doesn't break anything, I suppose it's fine, but after all the windows pull requests, I assume that any change will break something on Windows.
